                                Use Ask Statista Research Service January 2023 Worldwide 2015 to 2022 2019¹ Estimate, 2019 data was calculated by Statista on the basis of a January 2020 Apple press release: "Since the App Store launched in 2008, developers have earned over $155 billion, with a quarter of those earnings coming from the past year alone."

2020² Estimate, 2020 data data was calculated by Statista on the basis of a January 2020 Apple press release: "Since the App Store launched in 2008, developers have earned over $155 billion"; and on the basis of a January 2021 Apple press release: " [...]developers selling digital goods and services [...] have now earned more than $200 billion since the App Store launched in 2008."

2021³ Estimate, 2021 data data was calculated by Statista on the basis of a January 2021 Apple press release: "[...]developers selling digital goods and services [...] have now earned more than $200 billion since the App Store launched in 2008."; and on the basis of a January 2022 Apple press release: " [...]developers selling digital goods and services earning more than $260 billion since the App Store launched in 2008"

2022⁴ Estimate, 2022 data data was calculated by Statista on the basis of a January 2022 Apple press release: " [...]developers selling digital goods and services earning more than $260 billion since the App Store launched in 2008",   and on the basis of a January 2023 Apple press release: "Developers selling digital goods and services on the App Store have earned more than $320 billion since the platform’s 2008 launch."
